name: ISEE
description: ISEE - atmospheric platformer with puzzle elements where the player character is controlled with one mouse click.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0 Ghz or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8500 or similar DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated or higher
